resources.string: Push Notification Service Tester
Notification Service Channel
This app requires admin privileges to better run continuously
Battery optimization is enabled. Please go to the notification service app and disable it to let the service run stably.
The app must have background optimization disabled to be able to run
IP: %1$s
Port: %1$d
Type your server\'s ip or hostname here
Type your server\'s port here
Save those server specs
A port must be numeric
Your ip or port has an improper format
Admin rights allow this app to enable the push notification service
App was not enabled as admin. Please head over to the device settings and enable it manually.
Disable the app as device admin and set the server specs in the app\'s settings first!
Open the admin settings page
Subscribe to notification channels
This permission allows the app to subscribe to notification channels
Receive notifications
This permission allows the app to receive notifications
Send notifications
This permission allows the app to send notifications
